website_summaries.verdict: Several pockets in this backpack simplify the process of organizing your gear.
pros: Offered in multiple solid color options, so you can find one to match your team colors
Gets high marks for comfortable padding in the straps and on the back
Has a dedicated pocket to keep a laptop or tablet safe
Holds more than you might think at first glance
cons: When full, backpack looks overstuffed and oddly shaped

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, but was much darker than the picture made it seem.
customer_reviews.author: Winslow Wildes

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for cheerleading because it was a near match to school colors and it was required. She likes it, it holds all of her cheer items such as shoes, uniforms and a bottle of water
customer_reviews.author: Parkhort P. Parkenfarker

customer_reviews.title: Well made backpack, will wear well
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack! I needed a replacement for my workout bag and read some reviews online and decided to get this one. It’s great!!!! Solid zippers and larger/holds more than it looks like. The stitching is all great and it will hold up to abuse well. I put all my stuff for showering, makeup, shoes, clothes, and there is still extra room. It has enough pockets to separate things but not too many where it’s a chore to keep it organized. Would also be great as a school backpack, or sports bag. (No pockets for specific sports equipment tho - bats or soccer balls, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: arica

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son just got this for the upcoming school year. He said it appears to be the perfect size and he loves the color. Time will tell if it’s well made but most Adidas usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a durable and comfy backpack and this one hit all the marks. I love this backpack and use it multiple times a week! Stylish, comfortable, and the material is good material so it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Panich

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: I love my backpack. It has 2 cup holders which I use for my water and a hot drink for my long nights. It has a lot of space so I can carry just about anything in it. It is super durable and easy to carry around. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Enough pockets but not too many like some backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to use in high school. He loves it. Enough pockets but not too many like some backpacks. It seems to be well made but we will see once school starts this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack that fits it's description very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yr old daughter who requested it. She is in love with this bag and it's lightweight but very sturdy. She can fit all of her schoolwork plus more which is important for heading into middleschool. We both are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds our expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is the recommended backpack for my daughters competition dance team. Holds 4 pairs of dance shoes, 2 Leo’s, a full change of clothes (including shoes), water bottles, and snacks with room to spare. Has a lot of little pockets and one for her phone right on top. The color is vibrant and it’s very durable. Note: we got it embroidered locally- it didn’t come with anything except the expected “adidas” logo
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Authentic Adidas backpack that is great for my sons basketball days. It large enough for so many items like shoes and ball and extra set of clothes. Highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn7695

customer_reviews.title: This backpack can handle it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a freshman in college this year. We have a large high school and she is afraid she won’t have enough time to go to her locker between classes. She’s literally caring every book she uses for school in this bag. So far it has held up great. Her previous Off brand bag, the straps fell off the first week of school.
customer_reviews.author: Lara C. Kelso

customer_reviews.title: great looking backpack of good quality
customer_reviews.text: My teen daughter loves this. Seems to be great quality. She has been using for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ljgodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for high school students, and it includes life time warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for school since they don't have lockers this year due to COVID and it has been a life saver! Super roomy and durable
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it so I don't know how sturdy and long lasting it is yet, but my 10 yr old loves it! Even her huge trapper keeper can fit in it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Adidas bags are the best / great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have (4) Adidas bags - this one is great just like the others. Great quality, great color, convenient compartments and good quality zippers - which are VERY important.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A great backpack for school
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great to used for back to school I personally love it , cause I can fit all I need in this backpack (:
customer_reviews.author: Eowyn Robles

customer_reviews.title: Backpack of Champions!
customer_reviews.text: Was so convenient on my vacation! I needed a new pack to last through the airport, etc. Comfortable fit on my back and shoulders, roomy pockets and lots of places to store little things, and really sporty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for high school and love the personal piece for the laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old loved this backpack. Great quality and a lot of room to store shoes And books
customer_reviews.author: LINDA LEE

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and lots of room. Bought for my daughter who ran out of room in her VS Pink backpack.
customer_reviews.author: WV, CLH

customer_reviews.title: High schooler backpack
customer_reviews.text: My high school student uses this backpack daily for 40+ lbs of books, notebooks, etc. and it’s been great. Seems very strong with high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: stlouismom

customer_reviews.title: Blue not purple
customer_reviews.text: Color is suppose to be purple but it’s actually blue. :(

customer_reviews.text: This bag is made very well. My daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: purchased this backpack to carry around my college textbooks and it is very durable. very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Bag was too small for my son whose in 9th grade. Returned it.

customer_reviews.title: School backpack
customer_reviews.text: My child likes this back pack for school. Child is 8th grade. Love addis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely everything
customer_reviews.text: Durable! Beautiful. Perfect. HUGE!! This bag is everything, I would definitely buy again. Very big and very good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: So far it lasted more than any other bagpack my daughter had Better than bradly and fossil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old uses for school backpack and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Farley

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for school, I don’t normally carry a lot of items but it has a lot of space and pockets of various sizes to stuff things into. It feels like it’s made from sturdy material and won’t be easy to damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Vega

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durability
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, my son entered middle school this year, so we needed a backpack that would hold a lot of weight, so far so good, backpacks are expensive, so the price and durability of this one is great
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Official product.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly right off the bat, first use with about 15 lbs. Still comfortable on my shoulders and holds steady/sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel alcantar

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson for soccer very well made would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack works out great for my daughters sports. great product!
customer_reviews.author: alritythen

customer_reviews.title: Large, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my middle-schooler. Great color and holds a ton. Able to fit 2-3 textbooks along with notebooks and folders. Smaller pockets are handy for extras and water bottle pocket is helpful.

customer_reviews.title: Durable.

customer_reviews.text: I got this book bag for college, and I absolutely love it and it comes with laptop pocket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Bag Straps Came Torn
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail! I am truly so disappointed with this purchase especially considering the price! I decided to buy an adidas bag because I had heard good things about their brand! I am really upset to see they'd send me a bag torn by the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved

customer_reviews.title: Really room.

customer_reviews.title: Durable back pack
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds alot. Seems like it will be great for our high school daughter. She loves the smaller pockets and the phone pocket.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Sons loves it. He is in 10th grade & it is always full.

customer_reviews.title: Separate compartments make things easy to find
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband to carry into work and he loves it separate compartments keep papers and miscellaneous items separated!

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a backpack that fit a full size basketball and this bag works great.

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker but bookbag is great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the book bag for a nursing program I was attending and it really has came in handy. It has lots of storage and is super hefty! I absolutely love it. (The color is much darker than the picture)

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it, not to big, not to small everything fits perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Love adidas bookbag

customer_reviews.title: My kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes it and it not falling apart yet, so I guess it's a good one.

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I MADE THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 8th grader who has a ton of books every day. I needed something that was not only stylish but also good quality, lots of space, and made with comfortable straps that's not digging into her shoulder's. THIS BAG IS A WINNER HANDS DOWN. My daughter loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Thin fabric on bottom
customer_reviews.text: It was cute and all but the fabric was super thin, especially on the bottom and I knew it would not last through the school year so I ended up returning it and buying a different backpack

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and well made
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this. Very spacious and has a lot of compartments for her books and supplies. Lifetime warranty. -

product_meta.title: adidas Unisex Striker II Team Backpack
product_meta.description: The striker ii is versatile to carry you throughout the day, from practice to school and everywhere in between. the 4 zippered outside pockets plus internal zippered organization will keep you organized and game-ready.
feature_bullets: Gently wash by hand. Do not bleach. Line dry
3 zippered main compartments to keep your gear organized
External tricot-lined media pocket to store your valuables
Padded shoulder straps and back panel for extra comfort
